content:
bdbcat pushed 65 commits to branch v5.10.x. Commits by leamas (30), bdbcat (23), nohal (9) and others (3).

  • VERSION.cmake: fix bad year, 2023 -> 2024 (0130b4170e6)
  • Build: Don't use -march=native (#4088) (86e3ab8e362)
  • build: Use system shapelib if available (#4089). (fb75b85e369)
  • Run clang-format (5b100ae55b7)
  • libs: sound: Don't depend on random variables (#4093) (c0aa7d1e8a9)
  • libs: sound: Fix Android FTBFS (1687bc24bb9)
  • Remove obsolete debian/ directory (c47a7c3c4ce)
  • build: Remove .deb package generation (0deda588e40)
  • CMakeLists: Remove obsolete debian package setup (36e3d06b667)
  • model/src: clang-format (65f4afd686c)
  • model/include: clang-format (93f18a957eb)
  • gui/src: clang-format (fd6a55f522b)
  • gui/include: clang-format (52abbe77e06)
  • manual: Add mandatory pre-commit hook text (ac667f0c0fd)
  • Check in pre-commit hook configuration [skip ci] (0b2c0f937a8)
  • Update code-formatting.ado (9bf3c68975d)
  • manual: bugfixes [skip ci] (e5edb58174e)
  • Flatpak: Revised build setup (#3856) (516f4d9abcd)
  • cci/config: Update builds and caching (52afffdb03a)
  • ci: flatpak: drop alternative branch hack (882e1fc9f00)
    [and 45 more commit(s)]

bdbcat pushed 1 commit to branch v5.10.x.

  • Android, workaround correction for libatomic required by armv7a (6ba6a07cdea)

bdbcat pushed 3 commits to branch v5.10.x.

  • Correct default CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to Release, Android (f3a079000e5)
  • Version 5.10.2 (c6b6fb60f2b)
  • Enable GA builds on branch v5.10.x (0a8307b537e)

bdbcat pushed 1 commit to branch v5.10.x.

  • Enable CCI build workflow on branch v5.10.x (12e5712b694)

bdbcat pushed 8 commits to branch v5.10.x.

  • Update NDK target to 22.1.7171670 (r22b), add cmake help notes. (eb2c4df93e4)
  • Correct Android conditional code for modern NDK (d0de32b0089)
  • Correct AIS ATON, BaseStation, Meteo target render size (6d5299139a9)
  • Correct fault on ShowZoomButtons=false (159bd948b7c)
  • Avoid log error report on missing AIS target name cache file at startup. (828cd32c66f)
  • Correct actions at plugin library load error, especially orphan plugins. (d382f298341)
  • Android, Add crashlytics key/value tracking for plugin and ENC loading. (dca197b88d2)
  • Adjust Android default build type to RelWithDebInfo (7e4d8e26bbd)

bdbcat pushed 1 commit to branch v5.10.x.

  • Android, correct CCI build by setting NDK on cmake invocation. (a0c1d3f722e)

bdbcat pushed 1 commit to branch v5.10.x.

  • Update Authors list in authors.html (9f37c52ce18)
